column2: so get a reservation. We had a late reservation on a Thursday night
column3: and the place was still packed. My husband loved his pork-belly scallion pancake and highly recommends it. I ordered the bahn mi goat burger
column4: and it was disappointing. (Our waitress brought me a Korean burger by mistake first
column7: I give the service high marks.) The burger itself was really bland
column8: which is unlike bahn mi take offs I've had elsewhere. It might have just been the goat meat
column9: but I also expected more kick from the cabbage slaw. The smoked fries were exceptional. Overall
column10: considering the hype and the cost
